name: Disable Custom Post Types
author: Muhammad Kashif

sections.description: This is a simple plugin to disable unwanted Custom Post Types which came with some theme or plugin and not required for your site.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Disable Post Types’
  3. Activate Disable Post Types from your Plugins page.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Disable Post Types.
  2. Upload the ‘disable-post-types’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate Disable Post Types from your Plugins page.

Once Activated

Goto Settings > Disable Post Types and select the post types to disable. Yes as easy as 1 2 3
